publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-107.2 Michael Russell: National Cultural Strategyâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-107) in the name of Mr Sam Galbraith, leave out all from "welcomes" to end and insert "expresses the commitment of the Parliament to foster and support excellence, diversity, inclusivity and creativity throughout Scotland and in all the peoples of Scotland, and commends to the Scottish Executive such an open approach." Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*
